title: Reposition owner photo to top-right of the website

requirements.text: Reposition the OwnerPhoto floating widget from the bottom-right corner to the top-right corner of the viewport. Update the fixed positioning in OwnerPhoto.tsx so it is anchored to the top and right edges of the screen (e.g., top-4 right-4), ensuring it does not overlap or conflict with the Navigation bar. Adjust z-index as needed so it remains visible above other content.

quotes: Top and Right Side of the website put owner photo

acceptanceCriteria: The owner photo widget is visually positioned in the top-right corner of the viewport on all screen sizes.
The widget does not overlap or obscure the Navigation bar's interactive elements (links, cart/wishlist icons).
The circular photo, glow ring, and name label remain intact and fully visible.
The FloatingWhatsApp button in the bottom-right corner is unaffected.
The widget maintains correct z-index layering so it appears above page content.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
The FloatingWhatsApp button placement must remain unchanged at the bottom-right.
nonGoals: Changing the owner photo image itself.
Modifying the Navigation component layout or styling.
Adding any new owner photo instances elsewhere on the page.
